scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts King David kneeling in prayer outdoors, with his hands clasped and his gaze directed upwards. He wears a crown and a blue mantle over a golden tunic. Beside him stands a harp. In the upper right portion of the image, a divine figure, likely God or Christ, is depicted within a celestial sphere surrounded by stars, holding a globe and blessing. The background is a golden, patterned field, suggesting a divine or heavenly presence, transitioning to a green, undulating landscape.
